subject: false positives with  expected=AnException.class?
msgSnippet: Hi all, I can see that this is nicer than a try/fail/catch construct. But what if the same exception type is thrown from another place than the expected one
messageBody:
Hi all,

I can see that this is nicer than a try/fail/catch construct.

But what if the same exception type is thrown from another place
than the expected one (inside the same test method)? Can't we have false
positives then?


best regards
Bernd
